lenders.name: Summer
lenders.loan_because: I want to be able to help others. I know how lucky and blessed I am for the things I have. So, I need to grow up with knowing there are people out there that are far less fortunate who I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: My mom is a Nurse and My Daddy is a reatail manager for a clothing company.

lenders.name: Kayan
lenders.loan_because: People in the world are just one big family and family help each other.

lenders.name: Vivian
lenders.loan_because: If I needed a loan I would want someone to lend me money. I would want that person to feel good about trusting me, and I would want the money to go to something worthy. If I can loan someone money to make their dreams come true for $25, then I will have a great day knowing that I am making a difference in someone's life. I pray God's best for the people who are giving and receiving through this website.
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently working doing Business Development for a government supply company.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: A little money can make a big impact, and I feel great helping someone achieve their dream.  Kudos  to Kiva for making our world smaller and connecting us to each other in a positive way.

lenders.name: Jazminn and Greg
lenders.loan_because: We want the world to be better. We believe that by helping another they in turn will help the world and make it better.

lenders.name: Shinji
lenders.loan_because: I hope the world will be better.
lenders.occupational_info: helping  students to achieve their goals

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: I believe that every person deserves a chance.

lenders.name: Karon
lenders.loan_because: I believe in order to recieve you have to give first, and everyone needs a helping hand sometime in their life. Helping someone just a little can make a huge difference in in a person's life. I know I am a very fortunate person to have what I do, and I am able to help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a wife and a mother of 3 young children. My husband owns his own business,I do all of the bookeeping for him plus so much more.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: God has been good to me and I want to share what He has given me.
lenders.occupational_info: Buying and resell at a profit

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide an example for my son early on that it is necessary to give what you can and that helping someone, whether they are in your hometown or across the world, can make a difference.  It really does feel better to give than to receive.
lenders.occupational_info: I help families plan and book their dream vacations.  I specialize in Disney Vacations and Cruises.  I love my job and take pride in helping families reconnect and create new memories through the Magic of Disney.

lenders.name: MDS LeVine
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do & the Kiva idea is really innovative
lenders.occupational_info: Awaking to Life Every Moment

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Global economic inequality is the greatest problem facing humanity today. Over 4 billion people live in abject poverty while the remaining 1/7th of the population pollute and use up resources at over 40 times the rate of their counterparts. There can be no peace until this inequality is addressed and corrected. Kiva offers an easy way for all of us to contribute towards the solution. After all, the greatest investment one can make is in your fellow man.

lenders.name: Giver
lenders.loan_because: Giving back puts a smile on my face. Helping  people in this global world and economy just makes sense. Are you a Giver or is it "all about you"?
lenders.occupational_info: Get outside in nature! Connect with others, make memories and enjoy life.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: I want to

lenders.name: Judith
lenders.loan_because: Together we can change this world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: Real Estate Agents.

lenders.name: Marky
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world and specifically women finding their way to support themselves. This is a small way I can help and I am happy to use this medium to make the world a little better for women world wide.
lenders.occupational_info: I help organizations creating training materials and deliver those materials or content to employees.

lenders.name: Jillian
lenders.loan_because: I've been so very fortunate and I want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital with inpatients and outpatients in need of physical therapy. I help get people moving again after surgeries, strokes, heart problems, or complications from diabetes and other illnesses.

lenders.name: chikkudu
lenders.loan_because: I want my friends to enjoy life
lenders.occupational_info: live and love every moment of our lives

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: It is great to be able to help someone achieve one of their goals!

lenders.name: Gracia & family
lenders.loan_because: I wish to change the world

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage success and dreams in areas where the community is trying to pull you backwards.Please use this money and work very hard and be obsessed with customer service and quality
lenders.occupational_info: I am a real estate lawyer and help people buy,sell and mortgage property for businesses and families

Paul - I assist portfolio managers in performing financial market analysis.  My company provides consulting services to asset managers, broker/dealers, and insurance companies.

Sally - I am a development director for a student organization.  I raise funds in various ways to make a difference in students' campus lives.

lenders.name: Tay
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand at one time or another whether it is money or your time. If you are in a position to help it is your responsibility to the human race.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a Creative Department and I am responsible for printing and web development

lenders.name: Zachary
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help people realize their dreams, who would otherwise not have an opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide access to boats to those who cannot justify purchasing one on their own. I am currently a student of International Business.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a store manager for a retail chain.

lenders.occupational_info: IF I GOT SUPPORT OF THIS AMOUNT I NEED MY BUSSINESS WILL IMPROVE.

lenders.name: Sheri

lenders.loan_because: I want to give back.  Someone took a chance on me and loaned me money to start my business and now it is my turn to pay it forward.

lenders.name: John
lenders.occupational_info: I am an amateur motorcycle mechanic and otherwise just getting by.

lenders.name: Mark Strode & Family
lenders.loan_because: I understand the power of credit, when well used, to expand the economic and social impact of individuals.

lenders.name: Harkins Family
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It is very exiciting to see what a small amount of money can do to help families across the world. Running a business to support your family takes passion, drive and lots of hard work and I am grateful to be able to help people achive their personal goals.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: "So powerful is the light of unity that it can illuminate the whole earth."  - Baha'u'llah

lenders.name: Navjeet

lenders.loan_because: I want to help women around the world, who in turn will help everyone.

lenders.occupational_info: Management consulting and investments

lenders.loan_because: someone made me a small loan once upon a time, and it made a big difference in my life.  Now it's my turn to do the same for others.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: people need capital
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home assisting other businesses with their computer systems

lenders.name: CYNTHIA
lenders.loan_because: I love helping people in need.

lenders.name: BONNIE
lenders.loan_because: I've been so blessed in my life, (just by where I was born and to whom I was born ), that I feel that it is both my duty and my pleasure to share with others.  I also believe that any money that I might have is really God's money, and the Bible says that when we help the least of our brothers and sisters we are helping Jesus.  We are also to love others as we love ourselves.  Also, when I do share , I feel wonderful.  It's a real high!

lenders.name: Bisma
lenders.loan_because: I feel being fortunate myself, it is my duty to help others in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a business and understand that working captial is important for a successful buisness.

lenders.occupation: Principal and Senior Consultant at Actuarial Firm

lenders.name: Ted
lenders.loan_because: I own my own business. I know the struggle and difficulty of trying to obtain working capital and loans. For the people that these loans go to, it may be near impossible. I want to give these people the oppertunities that I had to create a business of their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide family entertainment to corporations, schools and churches.

lenders.name: April
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: Every human deserves a shot at making their dreams come true.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with children every day is the greatest job on the planet!

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea to help those who are trying to make a living but are having a hard time due to various circumstances in their life. To give a person a break in life is a wonderful gift and one that I am grateful to be able to give.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: The idea of microfinance support for local market-based entrepreneurship is critical to raising world wide standards of living.  Small is beautiful.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses become more successful.

lenders.name: King Theo
lenders.loan_because: Im a lover and a barker.
lenders.occupational_info: I remind people to love... me.

lenders.name: Anne-Marie
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all connected and interdependent.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an artist who designs for prints and the internet..

lenders.name: Jasmine & Brad
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people in need, people who were not born into our circumstances but born into poverty.  Many people in our lives have believed in us and supported us.  We want to share some of that support & hope to help make a positive difference in someone's life.  Our country, the U.S. has so much more & so much excess, material excess, that we do not need, how can we not give, how can we not share?  And how AWESOME is it, that instead of going to a movie or dining out, or buying a new gadget we DO NOT NEED, we can give $25.00 and change someone's life!  =)

lenders.name: Reneida
lenders.loan_because: It's more than just donating. It is giving somebody the opportunity to progress and improve his or her life not just once, but many times over.

lenders.loan_because: I love helping out people!

lenders.loan_because: I feel like I'm helping someone to better their life.

lenders.loan_because: We're all one.

lenders.name: Lindzel

lenders.loan_because: I take a long term view of the world but have only a short lifetime to make some difference.

lenders.occupational_info: I build treatment plants to treat and remediate contaminated water and soils.

lenders.name: SC

lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a quality inspector in a wire factory.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: You can really see the impact your loan has on an individual basis...and it feels good to help people work toward their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and direct for TV.  I spend a lot of time behind a computer using my imagination.  When I'm not working I spend as much time as I can with my family.

lenders.name: Ashley
lenders.loan_because:
I am not claiming to be an expert, nor do I have all the answers. I am claiming to share what I know, to be in your corner, to be a friend, to help you, to guide you, to listen to you, to learn from you, and to  experience a life full of abundance with you. One day at a time!

GOD BLESS!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a widower and really enjoy internet marketing. I consider what I do A labor of love.

lenders.name: Sandi
lenders.loan_because: my small loan makes a huge difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: I recieve so much love and sharing from my community, I want to return  that love and pass it on to others . It completes the circle of giving and recieiving . I believe we are all one and together we can heal our world with love and joy!  I am so amazed with all the wonderful beings trying to make a difference in their lives. I am so blessed I can give back and share with others so they can live their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: The work I am doing is to promote God first... After working in the capital world for 37 plus years I am now living quietly in the priviate sector, and beginning to rise to my calling. Giving back and helping others to build a positive life with God first and loving one another. its time for all faiths to come together for the purpose of peace and learning from one another. God Bless Kat

lenders.name: Sylvia
lenders.loan_because: Everybody should be able to follow a dream and we are all people just trying to make a life

lenders.name: Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I now see that borrowers are diligent in repaying their loans, and my original loans can be re-loaned many times, making the impact even larger. My focus in making loans is Eastern Europe, and parts of the former USSR. My three original loans are now multiplied into nine loans.
lenders.occupational_info: My formal training is in human nutrition, and I've worked as a dietitian for over 20 years. I now divide my time between wellness coaching and speaking. My passion is public speaking, and I coach speakers to "find their voice" and communicate better.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I believe we need to share with the poor.
lenders.occupational_info: I work extensively with my church since I've retired.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a little girl growing up with two of the best parents and my work right now is to help other Mamas and Papas with their jobs.  My Mama stays at home and helps me grow, learn and play. My Papa works in San Francisco, California, USA as a telecommunications engineer.

On the other hand we are still somewhat farmers and still grow a lot of our plants.

My partner and wife consults people on better gardening with a goal to more sustainable suburban front and back yards.

"TO THE WORLD YOU MAY BE ONE PERSON, BUT TO ONE PERSON YOU MAY BE THE WORLD"......   unknown

lenders.name: jmar8692
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of lending money to the enterprising people. This can hopefully create much more benefit than just giving money to regular charity (i.e. less risk of corruption or uselessly spent money).
lenders.occupational_info: We develop software for laptops equipped with our fingerprint readers, so the users can for example login to Windows or their favourite web page using their fingerprints instead of typing username and password.

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: people need a hand in life and if I am able, I will give.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Shafqat
lenders.loan_because: This may help someone in need and is a good thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer programs which is used by many people to do things faster and easily.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: To be so blessed in my own life, How can I not.

lenders.name: Carsten [博思腾]
lenders.loan_because:
b/c "Talent is universal, opportunity is not"
(thx Rye)

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: I am embarking on person-to-person loans as a financial hobby, one where I can help others by loaning them money at a modest interest rate.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop online courses and websites for agencies that cannot afford to work with commercial companies.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: It is my Humanitrian duty to help my fellow man who is willing to help him/her self

lenders.name: Sauro
lenders.loan_because: “Pongo attenzione alle esigenze degli altri, imparo ad ascoltare”

lenders.name: Lynae
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all part of one big community and are meant to help each other. Serving in the Peace Corps and lending on Kiva are the two ways I have chosen to try to make this a better world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  a returned Peace Corps volunteer (RPCV) I served in Ukraine as a community developer.

lenders.name: Jori
lenders.loan_because: I'm a single mom and I have been blessed with so many things in my life.  It's such an inspiration to see people helping other people to help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital to make sure the bills are paid, the employees are paid and provide information to make business decisions.   We are a not-for-profit organization, but we still have to run a smart business so that we can provide healthcare to anyone who walks through the door.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: Progress is a great thing to make.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of loaning the money instead of giving it.... it allows the person to feel dignity in achievement and not just hand outs.... this way it allows the person to continue to provide for themselves and their family.. it also fulfills one of the principles of Christ ... and there is nothing better than that...
lenders.occupational_info: I am a landscape designer... placing what God has created in a pleasing way....I  am very familiar with all kinds of plants... I know how to plant seeds, nuture them, patiently wait for growth and then return for a harvest...

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make development work.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise companies, often large corporations, on how to improve themselves.

lenders.name: Rich
lenders.loan_because: I live a comfortable life and want to give something back to causes and individuals in need.
lenders.occupational_info: graphic artist studying to become an elementary school teacher

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I essentially made myself into who I am today and value the concept of hard work to achieve your dreams. At the age of 25 I now own two homes and have put myself through college. I now want to give back to those that are trying to make a difference and just need a helping hand. Having served 5 years in the US Marine Corps I have visited many different countries and have seen third-world poverty. Any thing that I can do to make a difference in a persons life is my reward!
lenders.occupational_info: I test software and implement/troubleshoot systems for the Dept. of Defense

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: If everyone shares we all prosper

lenders.name: kris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in and pursue helping my brothers and sisters in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise people in need

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: My new business venture is making one-of-a-kind jewelry and accessories.  When I see another woman utilizing creativity, available resources and business acumen it resonates and, regardless of which continent she is from, I feel a common bond.
lenders.occupational_info: I make one-of-a-kind jewelry and accessories with natural stones, precious metals, vintage charms, and beads handmade from other artists around the world.

lenders.name: Amber
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference

lenders.name: Scot
lenders.occupation: Writer of fantasy and science fiction
lenders.loan_because: While our technical progess is amazing, a daily wonder, sometimes it is difficult to believe in the progress of humanity.  Kiva allows technology and humanity to walk hand in hand toward a better future.  Bravo, Kiva, and blessings to each and every lender and entrepreneur.
lenders.occupational_info: In my day job, I write marketing copy for web sites.  For fun, fame, and friends, I write stories and novels of science and fantasy fiction.

lenders.name: Kelly and John
lenders.loan_because: Life is short -- live it well.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I can and because it is the right thing to do. What better way to take stock of what blessings we have than to make ourselves seek out those who have less and actively take action in helping these people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a service provider to other businesses in Florida, USA. We clean and maintain commercial buildings.

lenders.name: Darlene
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping someone reach their dream. What a great way to give back to the world opportunities to help others.

lenders.name: Hannes
lenders.loan_because: I know that money is necessary to start a business
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies to define their Strategy and to set up Finance and Organisational structures.

lenders.name: Cary
lenders.loan_because: I have a moral obligation to give to others in order to live a spritiually fulfilling life
lenders.occupational_info: My company provides billing services for utilities such as water, gas and electricity

lenders.name: Sue & Krista
lenders.loan_because: If you know the good, you do the good.
lenders.occupational_info: Sue manages rental properties. Krista is doing her degree in International Development.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: Pay it Forward

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: It makes me happy to help someone make their dream come true :)
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies provide Health Insurance for their companies

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help on behalf of my children and in the spirit that good things are possible for good people.
lenders.occupational_info: I write songs and music, produce records and work as a sound engineer.  I also play guitar and many other instruments.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I care about others and want to support them in their efforts to provide for their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the honor of helping a woman bring her newborn baby into the world!

lenders.name: Bradley Banks
lenders.loan_because: Those who can, should.

lenders.name: Gustavo
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my best to generate ideas to have a better world.

lenders.name: Glenn & Jasmin
lenders.loan_because:
We're so happy that Kiva has created this connection between those who are in need and those who are fortunate enough to be in the situation to be able to help.
We agree with Sir Winston Churchill when he said:
"We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give. "

lenders.name: Anura
lenders.loan_because: I like to see technology being used for good of the many.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a secondary school art teacher.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help an honest, ambitious individual who needs a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I make movies!

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: John 3:15

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: everyone has the potential to make their lives better.  If we can provide that initial lift to help others to do that, it can make a world of difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to work in jobs that allow me to help others around the world.  Right now I am an assistant in an international development company that teaches people how to build successful businesses, both in the U.S. and abroad.

lenders.name: Jim & Janet
lenders.loan_because: This is such a fantastic and great use of the internet! This website reduces the size of our world and allows us to be connected to one another. This allows us to reach out and help many people over time.
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for people through the medical and nursing professions.

lenders.name: Tamika
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!  Help those in need.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help people, especially women, get out of poverty.  Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm active in working on issues dealing with social justice and civil rights.  I also do photography, focusing on children and women in countries ranging from Albania to Guatemala.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves the opportunity to express their talents, build a thriving business, and live a joyful life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help individuals and couples create positive changes in their lives and relationships.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a simple gesture that can go a long way.

lenders.name: carmen
lenders.loan_because: WANT TO GIVE IN RETURN FOR MY TWO GREAT AND HEATHY DAUGHTERS GOD HAS GAVE ME.
lenders.occupational_info: LEARNING ABOUT PEOPLE

lenders.name: Colleen
lenders.loan_because: i like giving a hand up to people who want to make a better life for themselves and their family.

lenders.name: PAMELA
lenders.loan_because: I love KIVA's mission

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because:
The little amount that I loan makes a relatively huge difference in someone else's ability to make a living.

I just feel that I'm blessed to be in a position to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: Making pretty pictures.

lenders.name: Mick
lenders.loan_because: everyone benefits from small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a hospital, keeping their computers going.

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: I care. Sometimes all it takes is a little help to see someone on their way to sufficiency.
lenders.occupational_info: I pay the bills and collect the receivables for my organization. I also help ensure that the accounting records are in order.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to make their dreams happen.
lenders.occupational_info: Tim designs and develops automotive components for car companies.

lenders.name: LEISUREHAMMOCKS.COM

lenders.name: Marisol & Mike

lenders.loan_because: We can

lenders.name: Janet

lenders.loan_because: I believe in the butterfly effect.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Leslee
lenders.loan_because: For me, Kiva is extending the Lord's helping hand one small loan at a time!

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe that we can all help in a small way that will make a HUGE difference, think about what else you would spend that $25 on???
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people, I listen to their  stories and try to help out the best that I can. (there are many diff areas but that's the just of it)

lenders.occupational_info: I aid those in the persuit of modifying their environment for a better way of living

lenders.loan_because: I  NEED IT TO  IMPROVE EXPAND MY BUSINESS.
lenders.occupational_info: I AM A LOCAL TRADER, THAT SELLS AROUND MY LOCALITY. AND I NEED TO EXPAND MY BUSINESS BY A STEP. PLEASE.

lenders.name: Rivux
lenders.loan_because: "The price good men pay for indifference to public affairs is to be ruled by evil men" - Plato

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: micro-credit loans are a simple and effective way to help others achieve their goals and dreams.

lenders.name: Teri
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good. I was born into the richest country in the world and had easy access to an education.  I realize how fortunate I am and want to help. My children are involved with Kiva also so it has been a great lesson for us. (my four year old took this picture)
lenders.occupational_info: Technology, Security and Mommy!

lenders.name: Natalia Corres
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in the lower income strata of society and received kindness & help from caring people so that opportunities were opened to me.  This allows me to pass that help forward.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is comprised of concepts and bringing them to reality through creative entrepreneurship.  I am a technologist, an artist, a writer and an animal welfare advocate.

lenders.name: Toshikazu
lenders.loan_because: I hear that they must spend money more significantly than my friend.

lenders.name: Fatima

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.occupational_info: I create value by creating something people want, and in return hope to receive value

lenders.loan_because: This is an incredibly creative way to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with adolescents, adults, couples, and families.  My goal is to  help them have better relationships and more satisfying lives.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea and anything I can do to help somebody rise up and accomplish what they want; I'm all for!  I've been looking for something like this for a long time and finally found Kiva, thanks to PBS.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: ashley
lenders.loan_because: What I can give is nothing compared to what I get in return

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help someone who works hard and with a loan can grow their business to help their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people to make doctor's appointments with specialists.

lenders.name: Prescott
lenders.loan_because: It is what we are supposed to do, help others out.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to provide equality in environments to allow people to improve their lives.

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupation: on site Fleet PM and Wash
lenders.occupational_info: oil change on company Vehicles and equipment

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I'm just passing along what has always been so freely given to me... Blessings & Opportunities... It's what one does with those two things... that become the gifts back to me

lenders.name: DEVIN
lenders.loan_because: I believe it's so important to try to be a blessing to others. Helping people by giving them the resources to be self sufficient for themselves and their families is a great way to not only take a step toward ending poverty but it also allows a person to possess the esteem that comes with being able to provide for their family. Helping a person achieve his/her ambition or dream (of business ownership)  that leads to self fulfillment is a movement in the right direction to fighting poverty and spreading blessings to others.

lenders.name: Nicolas, Jr.
lenders.loan_because: I need more capital, US$3,000, to buy and resell local products to generate employment in the rural areas

lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do! and really why not?

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I have too much money
lenders.occupational_info: uh... what work?

lenders.name: Julio
lenders.loan_because:
I was raised in a low income community in North Philadelphia, PA. 
I see the need to help other accomplish thier life goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist low income families with federal assistance when pruchasing thier first home.

lenders.name: Laurence
lenders.loan_because: Small donations made by many people can create large changes in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage all of the companies and people that are needed to construct a building.

lenders.name: Olive & Alice
lenders.loan_because: we are all family.

lenders.name: Louisa
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to give back to the Community and help individuals who are trying to improve their situation.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work towards a clean energy future.

lenders.name: Keisuke
lenders.loan_because: it's my business.

lenders.name: Julian
lenders.loan_because: Eases the ole conscience a little bit, and this way you know for sure that you are helping someone directly
lenders.occupational_info: I work in finance, normally lending out other peoples money to people who want to pay off their credit cards or go on holiday, so its kinda nice to be able to give our my own money for something slightly less shallow

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed tremendously and I love helping others. While I'll never get to meet these wonderful people...I share their entrepreneurial spirit and their passion to make something work. How exciting to be a part of something so wonderful! Thank you Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an advocate for diversity and lover of people. I fight against racism and inequality. I educate children, adults...anyone who will listen!

lenders.name: Doris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: we all need a little help from each other.

lenders.name: AlexanderDSM
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an ambitious young person.  I was elected to City Council at age 21, started 4 businesses before graduating college, and serve on various philanthropic boards and organizations.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I feel like Kiva can actually help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a library helping people find things.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: We are to love one another.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: this is such a simple way to make a difference in peoples' lives

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: making a donation feeds a person in the short term - but creating a business feeds many families in the long term.

lenders.name: Yenchi
lenders.loan_because: I can and I would like to.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because: What I consider a small amount can change a life - not by giving but by empowering someone to build a better life.  As a student of economics, I enjoy being able to make a difference and apply some great principles.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work within a large organization, where even still, small amounts can make huge differences.  

Both my parents built their own businesses and I consider myself to have some entrepreneurial spirit.

lenders.name: MELANIE
lenders.loan_because: I think owning a business is very rewarding and also very challenging.  Sometimes- even the smallest bit of help can be the boost you need to get your business from one level to the next.  I have been so fortunate to have people help me in my busines along the way... I would love to do that for someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: I own and work at San Diego Bay Flower Company in San Diego, California USA.  It is a small retail floral and gift shop.  We sell beautiful flowers as well as hand made and local artesian gift ware, cards and stationery.

lenders.name: Kris Tan
lenders.loan_because: I believe that providing people the means to help themselves is one of the greatest gifts that we can humbly and joyfully provide.
lenders.occupational_info: Happy but humble grunt in a local Private Equity Firm. :)

lenders.name: Emmanouil
lenders.loan_because: I think it helps
lenders.occupational_info: dealing on creation or manipulation of pictures, images, visual things of many kinds

lenders.name: Joseph A. Vieira
lenders.loan_because:
From an entrepreneur to entrepreneur:

I loan because I want to elevate the economy status.  Nothing can go wrong when a positive contribution is made.  I am all for social enterprise, social justice and social change. 

 It is a good feeling.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur who is never satisfied.  I chase and create opportunities that are social-centered aims to make a place better.

lenders.name: Augustine Family
lenders.loan_because: We believe in people. Their determination to better themselves, their family and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: We renovate homes and work spaces to fit the needs and wants of the individual(s). We do everything from framing, drywall, painting, construction, demolition, electrical, plumbing, landscaping, etc.

lenders.name: Jonathan
lenders.loan_because: I think microcredit is one of the most powerful ways to fight poverty in the world.  This organization connects people in a constructive way.

lenders.name: Junji & Misako
lenders.loan_because:
this is what we can do.
We've been fortunate, it's our turn to give it back.

lenders.name: Wolfgang
lenders.loan_because: Holding a university degree in Business Studies gives me a special view on all kind of financial transactions and business in general. Microfinance did attract me in the first minute I did read about. In 2007 a friend of mine showed me an article about Kiva in a newspaper in Hong Kong and the concept is simply perfect to connect people like me to people who can take a huge advantage of such a "small" (at least for me) loan. A "small" piece to make our world a bit better.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for IBM Germany with clients interested in software solutions from IBM.

lenders.name: Tommy
lenders.loan_because: I believe providing loans is a sustainable solution compared to simple donation of money. I believe and hope in a future, where fewer people will be dependent on Kiva and other similar organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: PhD student in biochemistry (protein dynamics and structural bioinformatics).

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: My country enforces trade rules designed to prevent economic growth in other countries. Kiva is a small step to undoing these restrictions.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop websites such as: http://www.blackgoldmovie.com/

lenders.name: James
lenders.occupation: Safety and Regulatory Compliance Mgr., Fisheries
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of individuals to create better futures for themselves, their families, and their communities.  Through the lottery of birth, I have been blessed with opportunity.  I want to share my blessings.
lenders.occupational_info: I help smart fisherman catch more fish safely.

lenders.name: Breanna & Daryl
lenders.loan_because: We can.

lenders.name: The Oates Family
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I work as part of a team to make health care more affordable to everyone.

lenders.name: Bent
lenders.loan_because: People around the world need help - do not wait for our governments to act on our behalf - let's take action ourselves.

lenders.name: natalie
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do

lenders.occupational_info: preserving and planting trees in an urban environment

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: It could be me.

lenders.loan_because: I want to give back

lenders.name: Vickie
lenders.loan_because: It's a small amount to help change someone's life in another country.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I feel the need to help others directly having benefited so much from the way of life I had.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a business unit in a public software industry. The software helps companies communicate with their customers globally. I am responsible for strategy, sales, marketing and consulting.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I grew up in the Philippines and saw poverty all the time.  I hate seeing the poor get poorer, and the rich get richer.  Because I know that compared the the rest of the world I'm rich, I want to help others and "be the change I want to see." - Ghandi

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: RS Family
lenders.occupation: a material handler, a seamstress & a 7yo

lenders.name: Michael

lenders.name: Holly

lenders.name: Martha
lenders.loan_because: Its the one thing I can do to directly have an impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I negotiate contracts with companies that want to buy products and services

lenders.name: marc

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can help someone further theirselves and their family in a better life.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to have a better life

lenders.name: Jenna
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to make an impact on the world rather than just teaching about it. My classes and my teaching philosophy has emphasized being active in the world rather than just sitting back and saying, "That's terrible" or "That shouldn't happen".

lenders.name: Marilyn

lenders.name: Kathy

lenders.occupational_info: I work for the largest manufacturer of commercial aircraft. My job is working with the computer software application for our manufacturing and purchasing end users. I write processes, training documents and assist the end users when they have trouble in the system.

lenders.name: Snowdrift Farm
lenders.loan_because: We are the customers and employees of Snowdrift Farm. We loan because we want to help those in need develop and deliver on their goals -- and because it feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: Snowdrift Farm is a leading distributor and manufacturer of materials used to make handcrafted soaps, cosmetics and body care products, such as essential and fragrance oils, fixed oils and fine ingredients. We ship worldwide.

lenders.name: Tom and Gabriella
lenders.loan_because: All our discontents about what we want appeared to me to spring from the want [lack] of thankfulness for what we have.

lenders.name: Pauline
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life.  I believe in helping any way I can.  Kiva provides an amazing simple way to get involved.

lenders.name: Tetsuo
lenders.loan_because: I believe all people in the world equally have right to live in happy, so I think I would do something to do for "us".
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to procure the valious  kinds of materials from all over the world for manufacturing industrial products.

lenders.name: Al B.
lenders.loan_because: Kiva changes lives with the change from our pockets.
lenders.occupational_info: Film making

lenders.name: Cony H.S. German Club
lenders.loan_because: Our organization promotes community service.  We see this as an opportunity to serve the global community.
lenders.occupational_info: We are students in grades 9-12 who are learning German.
